name: Keyboard Component Variants
description:
这是我做的键盘Variants，我尽可能的把键盘做成可拉伸的弹性布局，其中增加了搜狗的工具栏，是因为在设计录入界面中，我们必须要考虑键盘控件的高度，总之是多了一个可选项，并且搜狗工具栏的图标我已经进行了矢量化重制。


This is my keyboard Variants. I made the keyboard as stretchable and flexible as possible, and added the Sogou toolbar because we had to take the height of the keyboard controls into account when designing the entry interface, anyway it's one more option, and I've recreated the Sogou toolbar icon in vectorized form.


Feel free to use them.
